Media

Blog Post: Homosexualidad: ¿qué piensan los ecuatorianos? with Alonso Quijano.

ISSN 2953-6456

July 2023

  • A short article which analyses Ecuadorian public opinion metrics on LGBTQ+ issues, namely, their degree of homophobia and their approval of their rights.

  • Analyses made available in GitHub.

Blog Post: Tres problemas para el análisis cuantitativo de los femicidios en Ecuador with Alejandra Marchán

ISSN 2953-6456

March 2023

  • A quantitative-oriented, general interest article posted on LIDE’s blog-type website, El Quantificador. Title in English: Three problems for the quantitative analysis of femicides in Ecuador.

  • The article analyzes administrative data sourced from the Ecuadorian government using R and finds three important problems which impede a clear diagnosis of gender violence in the country. The source code was made available as a GitHub repository.

Blog Post: Una perspectiva cuantitativa sobre las protestas en Ecuador

ISSN 2953-6456

July 2022

  • A quantitative-oriented, general interest article posted on LIDE’s blog-type website, El Quantificador. Title in English: A quantitative perspective on the Ecuadorian protests.

  • The article analyzes survey data from the AmericasBarometer using R on the attitudes of Ecuadorians towards protests. The source code was made available as a GitHub repository.

Radio: The ISSPOL Scandal

September 2020

  • In this radio feature, I speak with some of my USFQ School of Economics professors at a local radio station program about a recent corruption scandal in the country and the specific implications of a journal article’s empirical findings about corruption.
